string.text: Hardcore Saving is enabled. Saves automatically occur when sleeping and respawning.
Stash with some of your items
Set Spawn
Spawn location has been set.
When you wake up you find yourself in a familiar place but with no idea how you got here.
Looking for your things you find someone left you something to eat and drink.
You also find a note explaining your gear is found in a hidden stash and to use an RF receiver with the frequency %s to track it down which will start beeping once you're close enough.
There appears to be a marker on your PDA where you were found.
Hi! I just wanted to see how you're feeling. You were almost dead when I found you.
I can't believe you are still with us! I couldn't believe you were still breathing when I found you.
Hey, how are you doing? I'm glad to see that you're feeling better now. You were in a really bad way when I found you.
Hi! Just wanted to check in and see how you're feeling. You were really beat up when I found you.
Hey, hope you're on the mend now. I was worried when I found you in such a bad state.
Hi there! I hope you're doing better now. You were really struggling when I found you!
Hey, how are you feeling? I'm glad you're doing better now, you were in a really bad way when I first saw you.
Hi! Just wanted to say that I hope you're feeling better. You looked dead when I found you.
Hey, hope you're feeling better now. You were in a pretty bad state when I first came across you!
Hi there! I'm so glad to see that you're feeling better. You were really in a bad way when I found you!
Hey, just wanted to check in and see how you're doing. I'm relieved to see that you're feeling better now. You were in a pretty bad shape when I found you.
Hi! I hope you're feeling better now. You were really struggling when I found you.
Hey, how are you doing? I'm happy to see that you're feeling better now. You were in a really rough spot when I found you.
Hi there! I hope you're doing better. You were pretty fucked up when I found you.
Hey, hope you're feeling better now. You were in a really bad state when I first saw you. I'm glad to see that you're on the mend.
Hey hope you are feeling better. You were in pretty bad shape when I found you!
I left something for you to eat and drink for when you wake up.
I left you some food and drink to enjoy when you wake up.
I left you a little something to eat and drink when you wake up.
I made sure to leave you some food and drink for when you wake up.
I left you a little something to eat and drink.
I added a marker where I found you to your PDA. Hopefully you can get back some of your things.
I added a marker to your PDA so you can hopefully retrieve some of your belongings from where I found you.
A marker has been added to your PDA to help you locate the spot where you were found, in hopes that you can recover some of your lost items.
Your PDA now has a marker indicating the location where I found you, which may help you retrieve some of your things.
To help you retrieve some of your belongings, I have added a marker to your PDA showing the location where I found you.
I added a marker on your PDA to indicate where I found you. You might be able to recover some of your lost items from there.
Your PDA has been marked with the location where I found you. Hopefully, this will help you retrieve some of your things.
I marked the spot where I found you on your PDA so that you can possibly recover some of your belongings.
Your PDA now includes a marker that shows where I found you, which may help you find and recover some of your lost items.
I added a marker to your PDA so that you can locate the spot where I found you and hopefully get back some of your belongings.
Your PDA has been marked with a location that corresponds to where I found you. With any luck, this will help you recover some of your lost items.
I've added a marker to your PDA to show you where I found you, in hopes that you can retrieve some of your things from that location.
Your PDA now contains a marker indicating the location where I found you. Hopefully, this will help you recover some of your belongings.
I added a marker to your PDA to help you locate the spot where I found you, with the possibility of finding some of your lost items there.
Your PDA has been marked with the location where I found you. You might be able to recover some of your belongings by checking that area.
I marked the location where I found you on your PDA. This might help you recover some of your lost items.
I had to use some of the things you had on you to get you out of there alive.
In order to save your life, I had to use some of the items you were carrying on you.
I had to use some of your belongings to rescue you and keep you alive.
To ensure your survival, I had to use some of the things you had on you.
I used some of your possessions to get you out of there alive.
I had to use a few of your personal items to rescue you and keep you from harm.
To save your life, I had to utilize some of the things you had on you.
I had to use some of your own belongings to ensure your survival and get you out of there.
In order to get you out of there alive, I had to make use of some of the things you were carrying.
To save your life, I had to make use of some of your personal effects.
I used some of your belongings to help you survive and get out of there.
In order to rescue you and keep you alive, I had to use some of the things you had with you.
I had to utilize some of your personal items to get you out of there alive and safe.
To ensure your survival, I had to make use of some of your possessions.
I used some of your belongings to keep you alive and get you out of there safely.
I had to make use of some of the things you had on you to rescue you and ensure your survival.
Keep safe, Stalker.
Take care, Stalker.
Stay safe out there, Stalker.
Be safe, Stalker.
Stay out of trouble, Stalker.
Stay alert and stay safe, Stalker.
Keep yourself safe, Stalker.
Stay cautious and stay safe, Stalker.
Stay alive out there, Stalker.
Keep yourself out of harm's way, Stalker.
Stay out of danger, Stalker.
Be vigilant and stay safe, Stalker.
Keep yourself protected, Stalker.
Stay on your toes and stay safe, Stalker.
Stay safe and stay alive, Stalker.
When I first found you I saw a %s member named %s, he grabbed some of your things and ran, hopefully you can find him and get whatever he took back.

I went back and hid your gear so no one would take it. You should be able to track it down an RF Receiver by setting the frequency to %s. Once you get close enough to its location, your device should start beeping.
I hid your gear to prevent it from being stolen. Use an RF receiver and set the frequency to %s to locate it. Once you're close enough, your device will start beeping.
To keep your gear safe, I hid it and set an RF receiver to the frequency %s. When you get close enough, your device will beep and you can find it.
Your gear was at risk of being stolen, so I hid it and set an RF receiver to the frequency %s. Your device should beep when you're near its location.
I secured your gear by hiding it and setting an RF receiver to the frequency %s. Use your device to track it down and it will start beeping once you're close enough.

To safeguard your gear, I hid it and set an RF receiver to the frequency %s. Use your device to track it down and it should start beeping once you're close enough.
Your gear was at risk of being lost or stolen, so I hid it and set an RF receiver to the frequency %s to help you find it. Once you're close enough, your device will start beeping.
I went back and hid your gear to keep it safe from potential theft. An RF receiver set to the frequency %s should help you locate it, and your device will beep when you're near.
I hid your gear to protect it and set an RF receiver to the frequency %s to assist in its retrieval. When you're close enough, your device will start beeping.
